restore_backup_view.title: Restore backup
restore_backup_view.warning:
Restoring this backup WILL overwrite all files!
(Your saves will be preserved)

Make sure the backup is valid as it will overwrite the console's partition files and might cause your Switch to stop booting!

create_backup_view.title: Create manual backup
create_backup_view.warning:
All linking and unlinking operations will produce a backup before making changes!

You should only use this option if you want to manually create a backup.

link_accounts_view.title: Link selected accounts
link_accounts_view.warning:
Linking accounts will overwrite all previous links.
(Your saves will be preserved)

If any of the selected accounts had a NNID link, it will be overwritten!

unlink_accounts_view.title: Unlink selected accounts
unlink_accounts_view.warning:
Unlinking will change users accounts.
(Your saves will be preserved)

If any of the selected accounts had a NNID link, it will be erased!
